fields.name: Construction Worker
fields.description: Working in the construction sites makes you stronger. You can beat others easily in a melee fight. And you can carry more weight with you.

fields.name: Waiter/Waitress
fields.description: Serving so many coffees and dishes makes you move more accurate. And you can prepare food better than others.

fields.name: Office Worker
fields.description: Comparing to endless overtime work, sleeping 6 hours a day in the wild is not that exhausting for you. You have better stamina than others, and you don't sleep that much

fields.name: Salesman
fields.description: It is a talent for you to easily sale anything to anyone, even water near a river. You get advantages on sale items.

fields.name: Programmer
fields.description: You gotta be smart and well educated to be a good programmer. You learn things faster than others. And you have a better chance when hacking any computer system.

fields.name: Basketball Player
fields.description: You keep practicing basketball everyday. Now it pays you back. You move faster than others, and your fake moves make it easier to dodge attacks in a fight.

fields.name: Gambler
fields.description: Fate smiles on you. You can sense it with your nose, while other people think you are just in luck. You are more likely to do a critical hit in fights!
